summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy environment. A character, seen from behind, is standing on a snow-covered slope wielding a staff. This character is observing or preparing to engage with multiple humanoid figures scattered across the snow below. These figures appear to be in various poses, some possibly hostile. The game's interface is visible, showing health bars, ability icons, and a mini-map. The text "Will x360" is displayed on the right side of the screen, indicating a resource or currency within the game.
